Sentencas: The performance of solid-oxide-fuel-cell anodes based on composites of LSCM and YSZ containing 0.5 wt.% metal catalyst was studied to understand the performance and stability of these anodes.
Titulo: A study of the methane tolerance of LSCM-YSZ composite anodes with Pt, Ni, Pd and ceria catalysts

Sentencas: Electrodes containing Pt were found to be stable in CH4 but carbon deposits with granular or filamentous morphologies were found with electrodes containing either 0.5 wt.% Pd or Ni.
Titulo: A study of the methane tolerance of LSCM-YSZ composite anodes with Pt, Ni, Pd and ceria catalysts

Sentencas: Carbon deposition with both Pd and Ni was greatly suppressed by the addition of 10 wt.% ceria as a co-catalyst.
Titulo: A study of the methane tolerance of LSCM-YSZ composite anodes with Pt, Ni, Pd and ceria catalysts
